model.name: views
model.metadata: CREATE VIEW JoinTestView ( RowId integer, SUPPLIER_ID string, PART_ID string, QUANTITY bigdecimal, SHIPPER_ID bigdecimal, PART_NAME string, PART_COLOR string, PART_WEIGHT string, PRIMARY KEY(RowId) ) AS SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY A.SUPPLIER_ID), A.SUPPLIER_ID, A.PART_ID, A.QUANTITY, A.SHIPPER_ID, B.PART_NAME, B.PART_COLOR, B.PART_WEIGHT FROM SUPPLIER_PARTS AS A INNER JOIN PARTS AS B ON A.PART_ID = B.PART_ID;

model.name: OraclePartsDB
